properties.areaDesc: Haskell, OK; Muskogee, OK; Pittsburg, OK; McIntosh, OK
properties.headline: Tornado Warning issued January 10 at 2:51PM CST until January 10 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a

* Tornado Warning for...
West central Haskell County in southeastern Oklahoma...
Eastern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma...
Northeastern Pittsburg County in southeastern Oklahoma...
South central Muskogee County in east central Oklahoma...

* Until 330 PM CST.

* At 251 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm with strong low level rotation
that could produce a tornado at any time was located over Arrowhead
State Park, moving northeast at 55 mph.

HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail.

SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.

IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without
shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed.
Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur.  Tree
damage is likely.

* Locations in or near the path include...
Eufaula...                        Checotah...
Porum...                          Crowder...
Whitefield...                     Canadian...
Rentiesville...                   Arrowhead State Park...
Briartown...                      Enterprise...
Blocker...                        Onapa...

This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 263 and
273.
properties.instruction:
TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest
floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a
mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter
and protect yourself from flying debris.

CMAMtext: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 3:30 PM CST. Take shelter now. Check media.
